status: α大啮小姐与Ω大神先生 ; α大嚙小姐與Ω大神先生 ; Alpha Wolfgirl and Omega Wolfboy ; Ookami Alpha-san to Ookami Omega-kun ; Ookami α-san to Ookami Ω-kun ; オオカミαさんとオオカミΩくん
description:
Description :
        Ookami, who works in a high-class restaurant, is a rough-and-tumble guy who calls himself an alpha. He is given the job of educating a newcomer, Akko Ookami, who is not motivated or pretty, but because of her continuous failures, he is forced to take joint responsibility. But he suddenly loses consciousness... and when he realizes, Ookami, who is actually a super-aggressive alpha, rapes him in her most outrageous form and reveals her true identity as an omega! What will happen to the twisted relationship between the disguised alpha and the disguised omega?

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.3 Chapter 9: Head To Head Confrontation
Vol.2 Chapter 8: The Identity Of A Handsome Man
Vol.1 Chapter 2: Your Body As Thanks
